[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@microsoft/rush-lib](./rush-lib.md) &gt; [PhasedCommandHooks](./rush-lib.phasedcommandhooks.md) &gt; [afterExecuteOperations](./rush-lib.phasedcommandhooks.afterexecuteoperations.md)

## PhasedCommandHooks.afterExecuteOperations property

> This API is provided as an alpha preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.
> 

Hook invoked after executing a set of operations. Use the context to distinguish between the initial run and phased runs. Hook is series for stable output.

**Signature:**

```typescript
readonly afterExecuteOperations: AsyncSeriesHook<[IExecutionResult, IExecuteOperationsContext]>;
```
